name: Blacksmith
closed: Friday, after Community Center restored and at 10:30 AM Winter 16

stock.description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.
stock.name: Copper Ore

stock.description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.
stock.name: Iron Ore

stock.description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.
stock.name: Coal

stock.description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.
stock.name: Gold Ore

farmBuildings.description: Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.
farmBuildings.name: Big Barn

farmBuildings.description: Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.
farmBuildings.name: Deluxe Barn

farmBuildings.description: Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.
farmBuildings.name: Big Coop

farmBuildings.description: Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.
farmBuildings.name: Deluxe Coop

farmBuildings.description: Allows you to create flour from wheat and sugar from beets.
farmBuildings.name: Mill

farmBuildings.description: An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.
farmBuildings.name: Shed

farmBuildings.description: Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.
farmBuildings.name: Silo

farmBuildings.description: Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.
farmBuildings.name: Slime Hutch

farmBuildings.description: Allows you to keep and ride a horse. Horse included.
farmBuildings.name: Stable

farmBuildings.description: Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.
farmBuildings.name: Well

farmBuildings.description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
farmBuildings.name: Stone Cabin

farmBuildings.description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
farmBuildings.name: Plank Cabin

farmBuildings.description: A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.
farmBuildings.name: Log Cabin

farmBuildings.description: Throw items inside to sell them overnight.
farmBuildings.name: Shipping Bin

houseUpgrades.description: Increase house size and adds a Kitchen.
houseUpgrades.name: House Upgrade 1

houseUpgrades.description: Adds two new rooms, one empty, and one with a crib and two single beds. This allows you to have two children. Kitchen is larger.
houseUpgrades.name: House Upgrade 2

houseUpgrades.description: Adds a cellar under the house, allowing access via the kitchen. The cellar allows the player to craft and house Casks which can age specific products (i.e., Cheese, Goat Cheese, Beer, Mead, Pale Ale, and Wine) to increase their quality and value.
houseUpgrades.name: House Upgrade 3

livestock.description: Well cared-for adult chickens lay eggs every day. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Chicken

livestock.description: Adults can be milked daily. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Cow

livestock.description: Happy adults provide goat milk every other day. A milk pail is required to harvest the milk. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Goat

livestock.description: Happy adults lay duck eggs every other day. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Duck

livestock.description: Adults can be shorn for wool. Sheep who form a close bond with their owners can grow wool faster. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool. Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Sheep

livestock.description: These are wooly rabbits! They shed precious wool every few days. Lives in the coop.
livestock.name: Rabbit

livestock.description: These pigs are trained to find truffles! Lives in the barn.
livestock.name: Pig

inventory.description: Dried grass used as animal food.
inventory.name: Hay

inventory.description: Keeps your animals warmer and happier during the winter.
inventory.name: Heater

inventory.description: Use this to collect wool from sheep
inventory.name: Shears

inventory.description: Automatically harvests from your animals each morning. Works on cows, sheep, and goats. Becomes available at Farming Level 10
inventory.name: Auto-Grabber

inventory.description: A decorative piece for your farm.
inventory.name: Ornamental Hay Bale

spring.name: Parsnip Seeds
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

spring.name: Bean Starter
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Yields multiple beans per harvest. Grows on a trellis.

spring.name: Cauliflower Seeds
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.

spring.name: Potato Seeds
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

spring.name: Tulip Bulb
spring.description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.

spring.name: Kale Seeds
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

spring.name: Jazz Seeds
spring.description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.

spring.name: Garlic Seeds
spring.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.(Available in year 2+)

fall.name: Eggplant Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

fall.name: Corn Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

fall.name: Pumpkin Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 13 days to mature.

fall.name: Bok Choy Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 4 days to mature.

fall.name: Yam Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to mature.

fall.name: Cranberry Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

fall.name: Sunflower Seeds
fall.description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

fall.name: Fairy Seeds
fall.description: Plant in fall. Takes 12 days to produce a mysterious flower. Assorted Colors.

fall.name: Amaranth Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 7 days to grow. Harvest with the scythe.

fall.name: Grape Starter
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 10 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

fall.name: Wheat Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

fall.name: Artichoke Seeds
fall.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 8 days to mature.(Available in year 2+)

yearRound.name: Grass Starter
yearRound.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

yearRound.name: Sugar
yearRound.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

yearRound.name: Wheat Flour
yearRound.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

yearRound.name: Rice
yearRound.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

yearRound.name: Oil
yearRound.description: All purpose cooking oil.

yearRound.name: Vinegar
yearRound.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

yearRound.name: Basic Fertilizer
yearRound.description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Quality Fertilizer
yearRound.description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.(Available in year 2+)

yearRound.name: Basic Retaining Soil
yearRound.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Quality Retaining Soil
yearRound.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Speed-Gro
yearRound.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Deluxe Speed-Gro
yearRound.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.

yearRound.name: Wallpaper (Random each day)
yearRound.description: Decorates the walls of one room

yearRound.name: Flooring (Random each day)
yearRound.description: Decorates the floor of one room.

yearRound.name: Cherry Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Apricot Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Orange Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Peach Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Pomegranate Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Apple Sapling
yearRound.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

yearRound.name: Catalogue
yearRound.description: Provides unlimited access to all wallpapers and floors... from the convenience of your home!

yearRound.name: Bouquet
yearRound.description: A gift that shows your romantic interest.(Unlocked after reaching 8 hearts with a single villager)

yearRound.name: Large Pack
yearRound.description: Unlocks the 2nd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 24).

yearRound.name: Deluxe Pack
yearRound.description: Unlocks the 3rd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 36).

summer.name: Melon Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 12 days to mature.

summer.name: Tomato Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

summer.name: Blueberry Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

summer.name: Pepper Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

summer.name: Wheat Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

summer.name: Radish Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 6 days to mature.

summer.name: Poppy Seeds
summer.description: Plant in summer. Produces a bright red flower in 7 days.

summer.name: Spangle Seeds
summer.description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce a vibrant tropical flower. Assorted colors.

summer.name: Hops Starter
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

summer.name: Corn Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

summer.name: Sunflower Seeds
summer.description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

summer.name: Red Cabbage Seeds
summer.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 9 days to mature.(Available in year 2+)
